thread.title: Griz Podcast: Calkins, Tillery, Herrington talk 3-point shooting and more
thread.title_full: Griz Podcast: Calkins, Tillery, Herrington talk 3-point shooting and more

author: Geoff Calkins
title: Griz Podcast: Calkins, Tillery, Herrington talk 3-point shooting and more
text:
How have Jeff Green and Courtney Lee looked in the preseason? How will newcomer Brandan Wright fit in? And how about that perennial issue -- 3-point shooting?
It's all fodder for this week's Grizzlies Podcast, with columnist Geoff Calkins as host and joned by beat reporter Ronald Tillery and Pick-and-Pop columnist Chris Herrington.
Listen below:
